block_comment: This block of code represents the function of checking hit in a 3-way set associative cache [Function of the block]. The mechanism of checking includes relying on the specific logic which could be defined within this else if conditional statement, where "WAYS" represents the number of ways, and the condition is precisely for 3-way set associative cache where it checks if there is a hit in any one of the three ways [Implementation details of the block].
